title: home | UZPG
snippet: I'm Uzay (pronounced ooze-eye), undergrad studying Math & CS, physics at MIT.I do theory of deep learning research in the Isola lab, and am currently particularly interested in a) the dynamics of in context adaptivity, and b) building robust legible world models that allow for improved long horizon performance and human empowerment..
